query:
UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team spends 12-15 hours weekly pulling data from 15+ disconnected tools (Google Analytics, social platforms, email ESP, paid media platforms, CRM). Manual report creation is error-prone and time-consuming. Insights are retrospective rather than predictive. No unified view of customer journey across channels.',
  aiApproach = 'Deploy unified AI-powered analytics platform that automatically aggregates data from all marketing tools, applies natural language processing to generate insights, identifies trends and anomalies, and provides predictive recommendations. Includes automated report generation, natural language query interface, and real-time alerting for performance issues.',
  primaryUsers = 'Marketing Analytics Team (3 people), Campaign Managers (5 people), Marketing Directors, CMO',
  currentWorkflow = '1) Manual data export from 15 tools (4 hrs) 2) Data cleaning and consolidation in Excel (3 hrs) 3) Manual analysis and chart creation (4 hrs) 4) Report writing and distribution (2 hrs) 5) Ad-hoc analysis requests (3 hrs). Total: 16 hours/week',
  proposedWorkflow = '1) Automated data aggregation from all sources (automated) 2) AI generates insights and identifies trends (automated) 3) Review AI-generated dashboard and insights (1 hr) 4) Natural language queries for ad-hoc analysis (30 min) 5) Automated report distribution (automated). Total: 1.5 hours/week',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Eliminates manual data aggregation, reduces reporting time, enables real-time decision-making, provides predictive insights, democratizes data access across marketing team',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce reporting time from 16 to 1.5 hours per week (91% reduction), enable real-time performance monitoring, increase data-driven decision velocity by 60%, provide predictive insights for 80% of campaigns',
  processOwner = 'Marketing Analytics Manager',
  affectedTeams = '["Marketing Analytics", "Campaign Management", "Paid Media", "Social Media", "Email Marketing", "Content Marketing"]',
  primaryMetric = 'time_savings',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 16 hours/week reporting, 5-7 day lag for insights, 40% of decisions data-driven, no predictive analytics',
  successCriteria = '1.5 hours/week reporting, real-time insights, 85% of decisions data-driven, predictive recommendations for 80% of campaigns, 95% team adoption',
  measurementMethod = 'Time tracking, decision velocity metrics, campaign performance improvement, user adoption tracking, quarterly team surveys',
  memberExperienceImpact = 'medium',
  brandDifferentiation = 'medium',
  operationalExcellence = 'high',
  impactScale = 'department',
  impactBenefitType = 'Time savings, improved decision-making, real-time insights, predictive analytics',
  impactFinancialReturn = 250000,
  feasibilityComplexity = 'medium',
  feasibilityTimeline = '3-4 months',
  feasibilityDependencies = 'API access to all marketing platforms, data warehouse setup, IT security review, training program for team'
WHERE id = 4;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives SET
  problemStatement = 'Marketing team spends 12-15 hours weekly pulling data from 15+ disconnected tools (Google Analytics, social platforms, email ESP, paid media platforms, CRM).
